attributes.action: Use military, diplomatic and economic force to regain the money owed to us by Iceland
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Icelandic people have voted against repaying the loans given to them, we call for the immediate closure of all Icelandic embassies and consulates in the UK, the cessation of all incoming and outgoing flights and maritime routes to and from Iceland, we call for the use of any force necessary to veto and block Icelands attempts to join the EU until the debt is repayed, and we call for the government to use all force necessary to block IMF money from reaching Iceland until the debt has been repayed.

In addition to this, we call for the Royal Navy and Air Force to be used as a visible warning to the government and people of Iceland, that Britain intends to regain it's money with any and every force at our disposal.
